edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math.BaseVector<Position>
      • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math.Position

  • public class Position
extends BaseVector<Position>
    A position in 2D.

    (Aka a 2D point, represented internally as a vector displacement from the origin).

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new 2D position.
